text.tspan: LineTo(hDC, x2, y2); // Draw a line
Brush (for filling with color or pattern)
Pen (with color and line width for stroking)
// When path is stored, you can call one of:
DrawIcon(hDC, x, y, hIcon); // or hCursor
DrawIconEx(hDC, x, y, hIcon, cx, cy, istep, hbr, flags);
x, y, cx, cy, DST_TEXT | DSS_DISABLED);
